edu.rit.pjmr

Class MapperTaskConfig<I,C,K,V extends Vbl>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pjmr.MapperTaskConfig<I,C,K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Mapper's data record ID data type.
    C - Mapper's data record contents data type.
    K - Mapper's output key data type.
    V - Mapper's output value data type; must implement interface Vbl.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable

    public class MapperTaskConfig<I,C,K,V extends Vbl>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Streamable
    Class MapperTaskConfig contains specifications for configuring a mapper task.

    • Method Detail

      • source

        public SourceConfig<I,C,K,V> source(Source<I,C> source)
        Add the given Source to this mapper task. A mapper task must include at least one source; it may include more than one source. After calling source(), call mapper() on the returned SourceConfig object to attach one or more mappers to the source.
        Parameters:
        source - Source.
        Returns:
        Source config object for source.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if source is null.

      • customizer

        public <T extends Customizer<K,V>> MapperTaskConfig<I,C,K,V> customizer(java.lang.Class<T> customizerClass,
                                                               java.lang.String... args)
        Specify the given Customizer for this mapper task. The argument strings for the customizer, if any, may also be specified. The default is not to use a customizer.
        Parameters:
        customizerClass - Customizer class.
        args - Zero or more argument strings for the customizer.
        Returns:
        This mapper task config object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if customizerClass is null.

      • threads

        public MapperTaskConfig<I,C,K,V> threads(int threads)
        Specify this mapper task's threads property. For further information, see TaskSpec.threads().
        Parameters:
        threads - Number of threads (≥ 1).
        Returns:
        This mapper task config object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if threads is illegal.

      • schedule

        public MapperTaskConfig<I,C,K,V> schedule(Schedule schedule)
        Specify this mapper task's schedule property. For further information, see TaskSpec.schedule().
        Parameters:
        schedule - Parallel for loop schedule.
        Returns:
        This mapper task config object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if schedule is null.

        public MapperTaskConfig<I,C,K,V> jvmFlags(java.lang.String... jvmFlags)

        jvmFlags - JVM flags (zero or more).
        Returns:

        Throws:
